website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point for an advanced camera that's able to record video at 4K resolution.
pros: Smaller camera body versus some DSLRs makes it easier to carry
Plenty of lenses available for purchase
Strong digital camera for shooting high-resolution 4K video
cons: Not the newest camera on the market, but still works extremely well

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the focus or quality
customer_reviews.text: I hate this camera. Coming from a DSLR I am so disappointed. Constantly searching for focus and then locks in on the wrong thing. Why would I want focus to be on the tree in the distance rather than what is right in front of the lens? If i can get it to focus the photos are soft and grainy. Maybe is would be a good camera for video but since I don’t shoot video that is irrelevant. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba_g

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but be aware of its minor limitations
customer_reviews.text: Great 4k camera! My previous camera was the GH2 and this is a huge step-up, the 4k quality is amazing and you can use practically any lens with the right adapter. I'm running a Nikon manual lens without problems. The jello effect is quite noticeable on fast pans while filming 4k, so you'll have to film around it by filming slow pans and avoid fast jerky movement, sorry Michael Bay this camera isn't for you. Kubrick? Yes. This is a killer 1080p video making machine, shoot in 4k, downscale to 1080p, color correct to your heart's content and publish!
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Mated to a Metabones Speed Booster and Sigma 1.8 18-35, this thing is the bomb. So much so I ended up getting two of them for my videography business. Not so much a fan of using it for photography but then again I haven't focused on dialing in the settings for stills the way I have for video. "Right out of the box" it may struggle a bit with low light but even without the speed booster if you work with the settings, no problem ;)
customer_reviews.author: e39'r

customer_reviews.title: Difficult at first to get good, smooth video out of it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera based on the reviews and wanting a 4K option. Lots and lots of menu settings (which is good) and a steep learning curve. Difficult at first to get good, smooth video out of it. Glad there are so many videos available on setup and use. Also bought a couple of adapters to mount my Canon glass on it and a Koolertron cage. I'm sure I'll get the hang of it soon.
customer_reviews.author: filmyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best DSLR there is. Comparable to red epic and a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best DSLR in the world. This takes 4K and UHD film like motion pictures that are equivilent to what high end movie studios use for a fraction of the price. This camera blows away all the Canon's all the Black Magic, All the Sonys... it just WINS HANDS DOWN. I'm a film and motion picture and video and quality nut. I know. Google clearest video ever to see the gh1, now x that by 4 = this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Blackout (Michael Biggins)

customer_reviews.title: I bought a dud - what else may go wrong down the road?
customer_reviews.text: Well right out of the box the microphone plug in on the camera body does not work. Yes, it's warrantied with an extended policy etc., but I bought it to use it - not mail it back to Panasonic for a 1-2 month analysis, diagnosis and fix. Yes, I checked my brand new Rode Windjammer for defects and there are none - the issue is with poor QC at Panasonic .
customer_reviews.author: mrsmaverick

customer_reviews.title: Best entry level Camera
customer_reviews.text: No internal stabilization is ehh, but the 4k, and slomo at this price point maked this camera worth it for sure. This along with a speedbooster and some canon lenses goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: River Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is superb. The many advanced functions this camera delivers is note worthy indeed. I have found the features easy to use and incredibly powerful. The superior quality versus return on investment just can't be matched. I have never owned a camera that costs so little deliver so much in return.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for video in low light
customer_reviews.text: I used this primarily as a video camera and my Canon 5D Mark III as my second cam for video on shoots. The quality is awesome. Great for low light environments. The ability to select a focal point by touchscreen is an awesome plus when you are shooting video. Supports HD and 4K video (one of the main reasons I invested in this). No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Marathe

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4K Video
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get used to focusing with this camera, but there's just so many ways I can use this camera to capture great video. I've done HD, UHD, and C4K with it all with some beautiful results.
customer_reviews.author: George Reese

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: if you want a starter camera, this is the best quality for the money. I loved this camera until i got the GH5!
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. Herbstreit

customer_reviews.title: but I do have a very good eye for video and picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a while ago, just never took the time to review it. I'm not a very knowledgeable camera person, but I do have a very good eye for video and picture quality. And this camera delivers 4k quality. I only see the footage on my pc and it looks freaking amazing, I can't imagine seeing it on a true 4k monitor or tv. Terrific 4k camera.
customer_reviews.author: Serge

customer_reviews.title: Insanely good
customer_reviews.text: Much has been written, so I'll just add that focus peaking, zebras, Cine gamma, and improved AF alone make this a worthy GH3 upgrade. And then there's 4K... Also, if you want the film look but don't want to do a lot of grading, Cine V is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great For Video!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this camera. It was a big decision to go with a micro 4/3 instead of a full frame. While i did purchase a metabones speed booster and use a canon full frame lens, I still have no complaints. I did a lot of research and am not disappointed! This camera is primarily used in my case for 4k video but I have also enjoyed it for stills.
customer_reviews.author: Jordancc

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: item came on time and would order again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Branch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it ... I prefer it to my 5D mark II and my 700D ... very interesting but the only issue is the low performance ISO of this GH4 , the captor size are not a problem if you make the combo GH4+canon EF lenses+metabones speedbooster
customer_reviews.author: Guimaraes Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best DSLR for video
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best DSLR on the market for shooting video. I'm a professional filmmaker and have used everything from Panavision 35mm cameras to the Red Epic, to the Canon 5D. With the right lenses, the 4k image of this Panasonic is incredible and it holds up well when projected.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Morrington

customer_reviews.title: this is the best bang for the buck option in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: For 4k video recording, this is the best bang for the buck option in my opinion. Pair it with the metabones speedbooster and it's way better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 4K camera under $1700 ever
customer_reviews.text: Best 4K camera under $1700 ever! I have two of these and take all my YouTube videos in 4K with it. Grab Metabones speedbooster and you can re-use your Canon or Nikon lenses plus 1 less F-stop! It's a killer combo like everyone on YouTube is using.
customer_reviews.author: Max Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this has to be one of the most feature rich and beautiful cameras. From slow motion (up to 96fps) to shooting 4:3 (with an anamorphic lens) I never thought I'd find a camera with all the stuff I needed in a micro four thirds body at this price point. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond David

customer_reviews.title: Menus and overall use of the camera is nice.
customer_reviews.text: lighter and smaller than I expected! Menus and overall use of the camera is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Vic

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, focus peaking, zebras, vlog, time lapse, and the 4k. meets all my video needs in a dslr body.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for indiefilmmakers. Period.
customer_reviews.text: This is the future of indie filmmaking. 4k video internal, lightweight, etc. You can't go wrong... and with a Speedbooster and some Nikon lenses, you'll beat cameras 10x the cost of the GH4.
customer_reviews.author: Revit

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic GH4
customer_reviews.text: Best camera for the price. I've been shooting with this for over a year now. No complaints. I did ship the camera to TX for audio noise repair at no cost. Just shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Marcho

customer_reviews.title: A terrific camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son, who is a photographer and videographer. He had been renting cameras for jobs at great expense. He tells me this is the best camera he has used to date!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a used camera
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the camera. As a used item, it works very well and I am able to create excellent news stories with it. Kudos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great GH4!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this camera. Very great camera for the price. Includes low light and good with low light despite rumors. I've upgraded to this from the canon 70d and I don't miss it at all. I love the 4K quality.great way to keep up with today's film videos and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Quavea Fetti

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera this is a link for my first try ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing camera this is a link for my first try [...]
customer_reviews.author: Tarek K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Don't believe the hype with low light issue. with the right lens... no problem!
customer_reviews.author: John Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: It's my beloved camera. Second time I buy it. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Lupa

customer_reviews.title: Can't find a better camera right now.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say it better than everyone else. AMAZING CAMERA! I did so much research before deciding to invest in this camera and I'm glad that I did. It's a great camera and the 4K is absolutely gorgeous. I also have the Metabones Speedbooster and the 2 pair with each other very well. I can use my Nikon lenses with this camera now and the options are limitless. Look at all the reviews to make sure this camera is for you. Keep in mind, it's geared more towards shoot video, but they didn't skimp on the photography features. This thing looks great all around.
customer_reviews.author: JSes

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Hit a Home Run with This Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great combination of features with especially good video options; great user interface; a terrific value
customer_reviews.author: David Salahi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good cheap camera to experience full HD and 4K quality.
customer_reviews.author: caitho aime

customer_reviews.title: Quite superb for video especially.
customer_reviews.text: The 4K video is stunning with the right lenses--fully broadcast ready in every way. And I shot 20GB of footage on 1 battery!
customer_reviews.author: Duane N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Gh4 Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Great Production Camera that shoots in 4K. I'm in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahum Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and easy to use! Take the time to learn the menus for ease of changing settings on the go!
customer_reviews.author: sbhbtb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect camera for the indie and professional film maker
customer_reviews.author: albert davies

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, we use it on our uav and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, we use it on our uav and we'll be getting the GH5 when it eventually comes out. Great company with great products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: Very bad customer support. I have artifacts showing on my lcd screen. Tried to reach customer support through chat since I'm traveling. That was not available, instead I was told to call them or email. Calling is not possible since I'm abroad. Their email address customersupport@shop.panasonic.com doesn't work. Email bounced. Ugh! Just amazing how big companies like this can mess up simple things. Should have never bought this,
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best purchases ever! It's a beast of a camera. :)
customer_reviews.author: W. Landry Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Camera. With a little knowledge you can get around low light issues. Battery life is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jensen

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing. not the best in low light
customer_reviews.text: simply amazing. not the best in low light. but when it performs it is the best in it's class.
customer_reviews.author: everett stewart iv

customer_reviews.title: Bought from Ritz...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and outstanding customer service from Ritz yet again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Videographers
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nearly flawless for video. This paired with some good lenses will result in some fantastic footage. 4K is just the beginning of the long list of features of the GH4. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Slye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Starter for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a starter camera to learn how to shoot better. I really like the video option for 4K though it performs poorly in low light. My stills have good quality and are suitable for what I wanted at this time. Be sure to get extra batteries as the battery life is not great--I record a lot of images.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hopbell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing images in a small body. Packs a powerful punch.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing images in a small body. Packs a powerful punch. Internal 4K images from a body the size of a small DSLR. Can life get better?
customer_reviews.author: StevenB

customer_reviews.title: GH-4 was good for Underwater use
customer_reviews.text: Using the GH-4 inside the Underwater Housing by Nauticam. The Video in 2.7 K was amazing and The 4k was also good. 1080 allowed me to shoot at 96 frames and that was also fun. Needs Underwater lights to be sharp. Just want make sure for anyone out there thinks you can take the gh4 underwater without a housing YOU CAN'T. The GH4 is not a waterproof camera but if you insert it into the Nauticam Housing it is waterproof. Do not submerge the camera with out first putting it into a housing!
customer_reviews.author: Hal Wells

customer_reviews.title: BEST 4K FOR THE BUCK
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 4k camera for the buck. Loving my new machine
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne O. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kick ass 4K for a lot less than $4K, bam
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 good Video cameras this one tops them all
customer_reviews.author: Jim Goldsbury

customer_reviews.title: ... camera i have been waiting for Panasonic is a great company
customer_reviews.text: an upgrade from my gh2 this is the camera i have been waiting for Panasonic is a great company
customer_reviews.author: JAMDUNG MEDIA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome... love the 96fps slo-mo. Image quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the most awesome thing in a long long long long time!!! excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: cesarlm

customer_reviews.title: Great stills, disappointing video AF,
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this camera, rather than merely like it. As a stills camera, it's excellent. As a video camera, it is a bit of a disappointment. While the video quality is top notch, the AF is less than stellar. See my video comparision with the 70d from Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: 4k is great, 120fps 1080p is great, Cine profiles are great, quality and durability and wonderful, you can't beat what the GH4 does for the price. Incredible machine.
customer_reviews.author: andrew Molle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera and seller ship it to me very fast I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: jessie cleaves

customer_reviews.title: MAlfunction
customer_reviews.text: Malfunction on the software or something, like others, i film then switch to photo mode and the shutter snaps close and the screen turns gray with erros and what not. I turn off and then turn back on and the gray screen comes up with error. This has happened before the first update and after installing the update......
customer_reviews.author: L. Tetterton

customer_reviews.title: High cost for cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: for home video, get a camcorder (better light, close ups, recording time). For stills, get a sensor at least APS-C size. This sensor will not give you fine details. If you had Nikon or Canon cameras (D800 and up, 5D and up) you will hate this cheap toy.
customer_reviews.author: FLAVIO

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has nice of neat settings but i still perfer my canon...
customer_reviews.author: David Serna

customer_reviews.title: can't say much about it since never got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this is probably a really great product but I don't know, I preordered the item and expected it early May, the problem is that what I got was just the charger and battery. I was upset that I didn't receive the camera, but that's not the worst part, when I went to return the item they refused to accept the return, because the camera wasn't in the box, even though I talked to an Amazon rep before I mailed it back. So be warned, if you get this through Amazon you might not get a camera, but they most certainly will charge you 1700+ for a battery
customer_reviews.author: Frank

product_meta.title: PANASONIC LUMIX GH4 Body 4K Mirrorless Camera, 16 Megapixels, 3 Inch Touch LCD, DMC-GH4KBODY (USA Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Base| Configuration:BaseThe Panasonic Lumix DMC-GH4 4K Mirrorless Micro Four Thirds Digital Camera is a true hybrid camera designed for both professional photo and video use. It features a 16.05-megapixel Digital Live MOS sensor and a 4-CPU Venus Engine, capable of capturing high-resolution JPEG and RAW stills, as well as UHD 4K 3840x2160 30p/24p and cinematic DCI 4K 4096x2160 video at 24p. Like its predecessor, the GH4 features a weather-sealed magnesium alloy body, while offering increased resolution on both the OLED monitor and electronic viewfinder. It also features built-in Wi-Fi with NFC technology, in-camera creative controls, and a high-speed 49-point autofocus in both photo and video mode. Use within the communication range of the device to be connected.
feature_bullets: Professional photo performance with exceptional moiré suppression
High speed 49 area auto focusing in photo or video, perfect for hybrid photography
Durable magnesium alloy body and exceptional shutter life meets the demands of professional use
Operating temperature:0 degree to 40 degree (32 degree F to 104 degree F); 4K 24p cinematic video (4096x2160), plus 4K 3840x2160 30p/24p

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
